title: Average attendance of the main football leagues in Europe 2018 to 2019
yAxis: Average attendance in thousands of people
summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The maximum Average attendance in thousands of people 42.7 is found at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and the minimum is found at Ligue 1 (France) where League Name is 22.1.
The Average attendance in thousands of people of League Name Bundesliga (Germany) is 1.93% larger than the minimum value at Ligue 1 (France).
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing League Name, and Average attendance in thousands of people in each League Name on the y axis.
League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has the highest Average attendance in thousands of people and Ligue 1 (France) has the lowest Average attendance in thousands of people.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing League Name in the x axis and Average attendance in thousands of people in the y axis.
The maximum Average attendance in thousands of people 42.7 is found at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and the minimum is found at Ligue 1 (France) where League Name is 22.1.
The Average attendance in thousands of people of League Name Bundesliga (Germany) is 1.93% larger than the minimum value at Ligue 1 (France).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average attendance in thousands of people for 5 number of League Names.
The maximum Average attendance in thousands of people 42.7 is found at League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and the minimum is found at Ligue 1 (France) where League Name is 22.1.
Second maximum Average attendance in thousands of people is found at League Name Premier League (England).
There is a difference of 20.6 between the maximum League Name Bundesliga (Germany) and minimum League Name Ligue 1 (France).

The League Name Bundesliga (Germany) has the highest Average attendance in thousands of people, followed by Premier League (England), and La Liga (Spain). Down to the League Name Ligue 1 (France) which is the lowest.
The League Name Bundesliga (Germany) tends to be 1.38 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all League Names, we get total 154.7.
